home.heroTitle: Excellence in Diamond Drill Bits and Podiatry Products
home.heroSubtitle: ANVISA certified quality for over 35 years in the market
home.aboutText1: Metalúrgica Brilho is a Brazilian company with over 35 years of experience in manufacturing high-precision instruments for podiatry, manicure, and dentistry. Our trajectory is marked by the constant pursuit of excellence and innovation.
home.aboutText2: We have a highly qualified team and a modern manufacturing facility, allowing us to offer products that meet the most rigorous quality and safety standards, with ANVISA certification.
home.card1Desc: All our products have ANVISA certification, ensuring safety and quality for professionals and patients.
home.card2Desc: We use state-of-the-art equipment and modern manufacturing processes to deliver high-precision products.
home.card3Desc: Our team is ready to meet your needs with expertise and dedication in every project.
home.catalogDesc: Discover our complete product line. Download our catalog and find the best solutions for your business.

institutional.title: INSTITUTIONAL
institutional.subtitle: Learn about our history, values, and commitment to quality
institutional.certText1: Metalúrgica Brilho has all the necessary certifications to ensure the quality and safety of its products. Our company is registered with ANVISA and strictly follows health product manufacturing standards.
institutional.certText2: We constantly invest in quality and control processes, ensuring that every product leaving our factory meets the highest international standards.
institutional.missionText: To develop and manufacture high-quality products for podiatry, manicure, and dentistry segments, contributing to people's health and well-being.
institutional.valuesText: Ethics and transparency in all business relationships. Commitment to product quality and safety. Respect for the environment and sustainability. Appreciation of people and teamwork.
institutional.visionText: To be recognized as the leading reference in the Brazilian market for podiatry and manicure instruments, expanding our operations to international markets.

products.pageSubtitle: Discover our complete line of products for podiatry, manicure and dentistry

diamondBurs.title: DIAMOND BURS
diamondBurs.subtitle: Brocas Diamantadas
diamondBurs.description: Our diamond burs are manufactured with high-quality industrial diamonds, providing exceptional durability and cutting precision. Ideal for podiatry procedures, offering perfect finish and safety for the professional.
diamondBurs.goldLineDesc: Advanced technology with special gold coating for greater durability and superior performance. The Gold line represents the most modern in diamond burs.

tungstenBurs.title: TUNGSTEN CARBIDE BURS
tungstenBurs.subtitle: Fresas de Tungstênio
tungstenBurs.description: High-performance tungsten carbide burs for grinding and finishing. Available in Maxi Cut and Mini Cut versions, with various cut types to meet the specific needs of each procedure.

ceramicBurs.title: CERAMIC BURS
ceramicBurs.subtitle: Fresas de Cerâmica
ceramicBurs.description: Ceramic burs with high resistance and durability. Ideal for work requiring precision and delicate finishing. Available in various shapes and grits.

sandpaper.title: SANDPAPER FILES
sandpaper.subtitle: Lixas Abrasivas
sandpaper.description: Complete line of disposable files for podiatry. Available in Laminar and Plantar versions, with different grits and premium brands like Norton and Alcar.

boomerang.title: BOOMERANG FILES
boomerang.subtitle: Lixas Boomerang
boomerang.description: Special files in boomerang shape and other exclusive shapes for manicure and nail design. High quality and durability for professional results.

tubularAdhesive.title: TUBULAR SAND / ADHESIVE CIRCULAR FILE
tubularAdhesive.subtitle: Lixa Tubular / Adesiva Circular
tubularAdhesive.description: Tubular and circular adhesive files for different applications. High adhesion and durability for professional use.

polishers.title: POLISHERS
polishers.subtitle: Polidoras
polishers.description: Complete line of polishers for perfect finishing. Available in various shapes (Torpedo, Ogival, Cylindrical, Flame) and grinding levels (Extra Coarse to Ultra Fine).

brushes.title: CLEANING BRUSHES
brushes.subtitle: Escovas de Limpeza
brushes.description: Professional cleaning brushes with polyamide bristles. Available in different colors and sizes for cleaning instruments and burs.

fiberMandril.title: FIBER / SHELL ENUCLEATOR / MANDRIL
fiberMandril.subtitle: Fibras / Enucleadora / Mandril
fiberMandril.description: Specialized line including Molecular Fiber for specific treatments, Stainless Steel Callus Enucleator and PM Church Mandril for file mounting.

supportSharpening.title: FILE SUPPORT / INSTRUMENT SHARPENING
supportSharpening.subtitle: Apoio para Lixas / Afiação de Instrumentos
supportSharpening.description: Essential accessories for professionals: rigid and flexible file supports, leather and abrasive discs for sharpening, polishing paste and standard mandril.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us. We are ready to serve you!

brilhoNails.title: BRILHO-NAILS
brilhoNails.subtitle: Exclusive line of products for manicure and nail design
brilhoNails.lineText1: The Brilho-Nails line was specially developed for manicure professionals and nail designers seeking quality and performance in their work.
brilhoNails.lineText2: With products manufactured under the most rigorous quality standards, the line offers files, drill bits, polishers, and accessories that guarantee impeccable results.
brilhoNails.lineText3: All products are developed with ergonomics, durability, and efficiency in mind, providing comfort for the professional and satisfaction for clients.
brilhoNails.prod1Desc: Various grits for each stage of work
brilhoNails.prod2Desc: High precision for removal and finishing
brilhoNails.catalogDesc: Discover our complete line of manicure products. Download the catalog and find the best solutions for your salon.
brilhoNails.benefit2Desc: Resistant products that last much longer

meta.title: Metalúrgica Brilho | Diamond Drill Bits and Podiatry Products Manufacturer
meta.description: Metalúrgica Brilho - Leading manufacturer of diamond drill bits, podiatry and manicure products. ANVISA certified quality. Request your catalog!
